full_summary:
### Announcement
**Title**: Procurement of Strainers, Sediment
**NSN**: 4730-21-901-4266
**GDS Code**: H902 (Hose, Pipe, Tube, Lubrication, and Railing Fittings)

**Publication Information:**

* **Publication Date**: November 3, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 17, 2022, 2:00 PM EST (Eastern Time)
* **Amendment Date**: November 4, 2022

**Procurement Information:**

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Trade Preferences**: Canadian goods
* **Currency Preference**: Canadian dollars (register only bids submitted in CAD will be accepted)

**Contracting Entity Information:**

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of National Defence (DND)
* **End User**: Various DND locations in Canada (including CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia, and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia)
* **Contact Information**: Sophie Sincennes, Department of National Defence: (819) 939-4055, SOPHIE.SINCENNES@forces.gc.ca

**Offering Instructions:**

* **Language Preference**: English and/or French
* **Submission Documents**: Submit in PDF format only
* **Attachments**: Available at the [Canadabuy](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/03/9cac0661f1d8c47c421f47c405cb0974/rfp_eng_230803.pdf).ICES: H902 — Hoses, pipes, tubes, lubrication and railing fittings)(URLavis)

### Description

The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for Strainers, Sediment. Bidders may submit one or all of the following quantities:

| Part No. | NSN | Quantity | Delivery Location |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 8609091 | 4730-21-901-4266 | 24 | CFB Halifax, NS |
| Y125T | 4730-21-901-4266 | 30 | CFB Esquimalt, BC |

Bidders must:

1. **Pricing**: Provide prices in Canadian dollars only
2. **Language Condition**: Offer either English, French, or both languages.
3. **Authentication Question**: Be prepared to provide Certificate of Conformity from
